# BuildLore

> Creative agency specializing in branding, video marketing, and content production for tech companies and Web3 projects.

BuildLore (formerly Guich Studio) is a narrative-led creative agency that helps tech companies and Web3 projects retain attention and build fans through cinematic storytelling, brand systems, and high-velocity content production.

## Services

- **Launch Sprint** ($4,600): Two-week launch package including narrative spine, teaser film, landing page art direction, and social starter kit.
- **Growth** ($6,000/mo): Monthly retainer with 3–5 brand assets per week, 48-hour hot-moment response, creator seeding, and lore maintenance.
- **Scale** ($11,000/mo): Full-service monthly package with 15–25 assets, quarterly cinematic video, creator orchestration (10–30 creators), style governance, and UX revision.

## Expertise

- Branding & visual identity
- Video production & cinematic storytelling
- Art direction
- Motion design
- Social media content production
- Creator orchestration & seeding
- Projection mapping
- UX & product design direction

## Notable Clients

Fantasy.top, Pump.fun, Wasabi Protocol, H Company, Eterna Labs, Gondi.xyz, Pressiat, Domestique Paris, Ledger, Warner, Guess Best, AAA Lending, Mentat, Olympia, Zyfai
